There is an space between "http://" and "download" in your message log. Are you sure you pasted it correctly?
The experimental site works for me. Maarten, please verify if the URL is correct (comment 1) and reopen if you still can't access the site.

mea culpa, mea culpa, mea maxima culpa...
I'm so used to Eclipse checkinge for every typo that I wasn't expecting this one to be missed :-(
Perhaps raise against update manager?
